Name: Slack - Detailed Notification
Description: Posts deployment status to Slack optionally including additional details (release number, environment name, release notes etc.) as well as error description and link to failure log page.

Parameters.Name: HookUrl
Parameters.Label: Webhook URL
Parameters.HelpText: The Webhook URL provided by Slack, including token.

Parameters.Name: Channel
Parameters.Label: Channel handle
Parameters.HelpText: Which Slack channel to post notifications to.

Parameters.Name: IconUrl
Parameters.Label: Icon URL
Parameters.HelpText: The icon to use for this user in Slack

Parameters.Name: Username
Parameters.HelpText: The username shown in Slack against these notifications

Parameters.Name: DeploymentInfoText
Parameters.Label: Main message
Parameters.HelpText: Long information message shown in slack. This message is prefixed with "Deployed successfully" or "Failed to deploy" depending on status.

Parameters.Name: IncludeFieldRelease
Parameters.Label: Include release number field
Parameters.HelpText: Shows short field with release number name

Parameters.Name: IncludeFieldReleaseNotes
Parameters.Label: Include release notes Field
Parameters.HelpText: Release notes are only included on successful deployment

Parameters.Name: IncludeFieldMachine
Parameters.Label: Include machine name field
Parameters.HelpText: Shows short field with machine name

Parameters.Name: IncludeFieldEnvironment
Parameters.Label: Include environment name field
Parameters.HelpText: Shows short field with environment name

Parameters.Name: IncludeFieldTenant
Parameters.Label: Include tenant name field
Parameters.HelpText: Shows short field with name of tenant

Parameters.Name: IncludeFieldUsername
Parameters.Label: Include username field
Parameters.HelpText: Shows the username of user that initiated deployment

Parameters.Name: IncludeLinkOnFailure
Parameters.Label: Include deployment process link on failure
Parameters.HelpText: When deployment failed a link "Open process page" is added to the notification pointing to deployment process page

Parameters.Name: IncludeErrorMessageOnFailure
Parameters.Label: Include error message text on failure
Parameters.HelpText: When deployment failed error text is shown as part of notification

Parameters.Name: OctopusBaseUrl
Parameters.Label: Octopus base url
Parameters.HelpText: Base URL to add to the links in the notification. If octopus server dashboard is at "http://octopus/app" include all before the "app" part ("http://octopus").
